Edges-Shadowdancer -- Male Human Heroic Shadowdancer
Attributes (12 Points):
Agility: d8 Smarts: d4 Spirit: d12 Strength: d8 Vigor: d12
Attribute Notes: Adaptability: +1 Attribute Points
Skills (20 Points):
Academics: (sma) d4 Healing: (sma) d4 Riding: (agi) d6
Athletics: (agi) d4 Notice: (sma) d4 Stealth: (agi) d10
Boating: (agi) d6 Performance: (spi) d10 Survival: (sma) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d4 Thievery: (agi) d8
Languages: Abyssal; Aklo; Common
Skill Notes:
Mild Mannered: -2 Intimidation
Danger Sense: +2 Notice (surprise)/Rolls Notice-2 in circumstances not normally subject to Notice
Size: 0 Alignment: Neutral Deity: Calistria (Neutral)
Advances: 12 Improvement Points: 28 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 12; Edge: 8; Skill: 8
Features
Edges (6 points): Danger Sense; Luck; Shadowdancer II; Shadowdancer III; Shadowdancer; Steady Hands Hindrances: Greedy+; Mild Mannered; Phobia Human Features: Adaptability
Feature Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Edge Points
Shadowdancer II: Has Shadow Cloak feature
Shadowdancer III: Has Mystic Powers (Shadow Force) feature
Shadowdancer: Has Greater Darkvision feature
Greater Darkvision: R20" Sees clearly in pitch darkness
Greedy+: Violently insists on getting more than a fair share
Luck: +1 Benny each session
Phobia: -1 on trait rolls in presence of phobia subject
Combat
Parry: 3 (1) Cover: 0 Toughness: 8 (0) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: None Shield: Light Weapons: Javelin (d8+d6 R4"); Spiked Chain (d8+d6); Unarmed (d8+d0)
Combat Notes:
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +6
Shadow Cloak: May attempt free Soak when wounded in dim or dark illumination
Steady Hands: No penalty for shot from unstable platform, reduce running shot penalty by 1
Arcana
Power Points: 10
Powers:
Blast: (3 PP) R8" 2" radius inflicts 2d6 damage (Raise 3d6)
Illusion: (3 PP) R4" Creates 2" radius visual illusion for 5 rd
Summon Ally: (2+ PP) R4" Creates obedient servant for 5 rd
Teleport: (2 PP) R4" Target teleports 12" (Raise 24")
Arcana Notes: Mystic Powers (Shadow Force): 10 Power Points/May cast Blast, Illusion, Summon Ally, and self Teleport w/automatic success (+2 Power Points for raise)
